thread.title: Justice Department files regulation to ban 'bump stocks'

title: Justice Department files regulation to ban 'bump stocks'
text:
Justice Department files regulation to ban 'bump stocks' Saturday, March 10, 2018 - 01:52 
The Justice Department on Saturday formally submitted a regulation to ban “bump stocks,” a modification that turns rifles into automatic weapons — the same kind of device the Las Vegas shooter used to kill 58 people and wound over 850.   
The Justice Department on Saturday formally submitted a regulation to ban “bump stocks,” a modification that turns rifles into automatic weapons — the same kind of device the Las Vegas shooter used to kill 58 people and wound over 850.  //reut.rs/2IfFSFD
